There are some small gaps in memory because of the way the malloc is built in C. Those spaces may be used for flags or some other things.

Address			Data		Alias
000000000171F010	00000001	PID
000000000171F014	00000005	priority
000000000171F018	0171F030	pNext
000000000171F01C	.....
000000000171F020
000000000171F024
000000000171F028
....

000000000171F030	00000002	PID
000000000171F034	00000003	priority
000000000171F038	171F050		pNext
...

000000000171F050	00000003	PID
000000000171F054	00000008	priority
000000000171F058	171F050		pNext
